channel.title: Trautonium Patch
channel.description: Made a little [Trautonium][1]-like patch. It's kind-a-like the [Doepfer Trautonium project][2]. It has four subharmonic oscillators with divisor values from 1 to 8 and a resonant filter bank with four parallel filters, switchable between bandpass or lowpass. And for some more spice you can add a portamento glide and a mod-wheel vibrato. Use lots of reverb on your mix (preferably plate or spring-like)! Axoloti rocks! Here's a [quickly noodled demo][3]. Cheers to [Oskar Sala][4]! Hope you enjoy it, too! Peter axo-trautonium.axp (28.8 KB) subharmonic-osc.axs (5.8 KB) [1]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trautonium [2]: http://www.doepfer.de/traut/traut_e.htm [3]: http://www.privatepublic.de/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/trautdemo.m4a [4]: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOtrbQdgeOPQciOCAd0TpSA

item.title: Trautonium Patch
item.dc:creator: @cpwitz Peter Witzel
item.description:
@cpwitz wrote:

Made a little Trautonium-like patch.

It's kind-a-like the Doepfer Trautonium project. It has four subharmonic oscillators with divisor values from 1 to 8 and a resonant filter bank with four parallel filters, switchable between bandpass or lowpass. And for some more spice you can add a portamento glide and a mod-wheel vibrato.

Use lots of reverb on your mix (preferably plate or spring-like)! Axoloti rocks!

screenshot-trautonium.png1337x626 83.7 KB

Here's a quickly noodled demo.

Cheers to Oskar Sala!

Hope you enjoy it, too!
Peter

axo-trautonium.axp (28.8 KB)
subharmonic-osc.axs (5.8 KB)
